analyzed: hṛṣyadbhiḥ paricumbutam nayanayoḥ nyastam hṛdi sthāpitam sīmante nihitam kathañcana tatas kārṇa avataṃsīkṛtam
tad etad catuṣṭaya nibandhanāḥ ca kavīnām dvātriṃśat haraṇa upāyāḥ
amīṣām ca arthānām anvarthāḥ ayaskānta vat catvāraḥ kavayaḥ pañcamaḥ ca adṛṣṭa cara artha darśī
tat āhuḥ
bhrāmakaḥ cumbakaḥ kiñca karṣakaḥ drāvakaḥ ca yaḥ
sa kaviḥ laukikaḥ nyastu cintāmaṇiḥ alaukikaḥ
tanvānaḥ purāṇasya api vastunaḥ
syāt bhrāmakaḥ kaviḥ
yaḥ cumbati parasya artham vākyena svena hāriṇā
stoka arpita nava chāyam cumbakaḥ sa kaviḥ mataḥ
para vākya artham ākṛṣya yaḥ sva vāci niveśaya iti

original: samullekena kenāpi sa smṛtaḥ karṣakaḥ kaviḥ //
analyzed: samullekena kena api sa smṛtaḥ karṣakaḥ kaviḥ
a pratyabhijñeya tayā sva vākye nava tām nayet

original: yo drāvayitvā mūlārthaṃ drāvakaḥ sa bhavetkaviḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ drāvayitvā mūla artham drāvakaḥ sa bhavet kaviḥ
cintā samam yasya rasa eka sūtiḥ udeti citra ākṛtiḥ arthasārthaḥ

original: adṛṣṭapūrvo nipuṇaiḥ purāṇaiḥ kaviḥ sa cintāmaṇiradvitīyaḥ” //
analyzed: a dṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ nipuṇaiḥ purāṇaiḥ kaviḥ sa cintāmaṇiḥ advitīyaḥ
tasya
sa ca tridhā laukika alaukika bhedena
tayoḥ miśra tvena ca
laukikaḥ

original: “mā kośakāralatike vaha varṇagarvaṃ kiṃ ḍambareṇa caṇike tava kausumena /
analyzed: mā kośakāra latike vaha varṇa garvam kim ḍambareṇa caṇike tava kausumena

original: puṇḍrekṣuyaṣṭiriyamekatarā cakāstu yā syandate rasamṛte 'pi hi yantrayogāt” //
analyzed: puṇḍra ikṣu yaṣṭiḥ iyam ekatarā cakāstu yā syandate rasam ṛte hi yantra yogāt
alaukikaḥ

original: “devī putramasūna nṛtyata gaṇāḥ kiṃ tiṣṭhatetyudbhuje” harṣādbhṛṅgiriṭāvudāḥ hṛtagirā cāmuṇḍayāliṅgite /
analyzed: devī nṛtyata gaṇāḥ kim tiṣṭhata iti udbhuje harṣāt bhṛṅgi riṭau udāḥ hṛta girā cāmuṇḍayā āliṅgite
pāyāt vaḥ jita deva dundubhi ghana dhvāna pravṛttiḥ tayoḥ anyonya aṅka nipāta jarjara jarat sthūla asthi janmā ravaḥ
miśraḥ
sthite kukṣeḥ antar mura cayini niḥśvāsa marutaḥ jananyāḥ tad nābhī sarasija parāga utkara mucaḥ

original: nipātāḥ sānandaṃ racitaphaṇacakreṇa halinā lamantādasyāsuḥ pratidivasamenāṃsi bhavataḥ” //
analyzed: nipātāḥ sa ānandam racita phaṇa cakreṇa halinā lamantāt asya āsuḥ pratidivasam enāṃsi bhavataḥ
teṣām ca caturṇām arthānām

original: catvāra ete kathitā mayaiva ye 'rthāḥ kavīnāṃ haraṇopadeśe /
analyzed: catvāraḥ ete kathitāḥ mayā eva ye rthāḥ kavīnām haraṇa upadeśe
pratta yekam aṣṭa tva vaśāt bhavanti dvātriṃśatā te nugatāḥ prabhedaiḥ
tatra pratibimba kalpa vikalpāḥ
saḥ eva arthaḥ paurvāparya viparyāsāt vyastakaḥ
yathā
dṛṣṭvā anya ibham chedam utpādya rajjvāḥ yantuḥ vācam manyamānaḥ tṛṇāya

original: gacchandaghre nāgarājaḥ kariṇyā premṇā tulyaṃ bandhanaṃ nāsti jantoḥ” //
analyzed: gacchan daghre nāga rājaḥ kariṇyā premṇā tulyam bandhanam nā asti jantoḥ
atra arthe
nirviveka manasaḥ api hi jantoḥ prema bandhanam aśṛṅkhala dāma
yat prati pratigajam gaja rājaḥ prasthitaḥ ciram adhāri kariṇyā
bṛhataḥ ṛthasya arddha praṇayanam khaṇḍam

original: “purā pāṇḍuprāyaṃ tadanu kapiśinmā kṛtapadaṃ tataḥ pākodrekāraruṇaguṇasaṃvargitavapuḥ /
analyzed: purā pāṇḍu prāyam tadanu kapi śinmā kṛta padam tatas pāka udreka āraruṇa guṇa saṃvargita vapuḥ

original: śanaiḥ śoṣārambhe sthapuṭanijaviṣkambhaviṣamaṃ vane vītāmodaṃ badaramarasatvaṃ kalayati” //
analyzed: śanais śoṣa ārambhe sthapuṭa nija viṣkambha viṣamam vane vīta āmodam badaram arasa tvam kalayati
atra arthe
pāka kriyā paricaya praguṇīkṛtena saṃvarddhita aruṇa guṇam vapuṣā nijena
āpādita sthapuṭa saṃsyiti śoṣa poṣāt etat vane virasa tām badaram bibhartti
saṃkṣit pārtha vistareṇa tailabinduḥ
yathā
yasya tantra bhara ākrāntyā pātāla tala gāminī
mahāvarāhṛ daṃṣṭrāyāḥ bhūyas sasmāra medinī
atra arthe
yat tantra ākrānti majjat pṛthula maṇi śilā śalya vellat phaṇa ante klānte patyau ahīnām calat acala mahā stambha sambhāra sīmā
sasmāra sphāra candra dyuti punar avaniḥ tat hiraṇyākṣa vakṣaḥ sthūla asthi śreṇi śāṇā nikāṣaṇa sitam api āśu daṃṣṭra agram ugram
anyatama bhāṣā nibanddham bhāṣā antareṇa parivarttyate iti naṭa nepathyam
yathā
na icchai pāsā saṃkī kāo diṇṇam pi pahia ghariṇīe
piṇḍam
na icchati pāśa āśaṅkī kākaḥ dattam api pathika gṛhiṇyā
anavarata kara tala udgata valaya madhya sthitam piṇḍam
atra arthe

original: “dattaṃ piṇḍaṃ nayanasalilakṣālanādhautagaṇḍaṃ dvāropānte kathamapi tayā saṅgamāśānubandhāt /
analyzed: dattam piṇḍam nayana salila kṣālana ādhauta gaṇḍam dvāra upānte katham api tayā saṅgam āśā anubandhāt

original: vakragrīvaścalanataśirāḥ pārśrasañcāricakṣuḥ pāśāśaṅkī galitavalayaṃ nainamaśnāti kākaḥ” //
analyzed: vakra grīvaḥ cala nata śirāḥ pārśra sañcāri cakṣuḥ pāśa āśaṅkī galita valayam na enam aśnāti kākaḥ
chandasā parivṛttiḥ chandaḥ vinimayaḥ
yathā

original: “kānte talpamupāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanāt tadvāsaḥ ślathamekhalāguṇadhṛtaṃ kiñcinnitambe sthitam /
analyzed: kānte talpam upāgate vigalitā nīvī svayam bandhanāt tat vāsaḥ ślatha mekhalā guṇa dhṛtam kiñcid nitambe sthitam

original: etāvatsakhi vedmi kevalamahaṃ tasyāṅgasaṅge punaḥ ko 'sau kāsmi rataṃ nu kiṃ kathamiti svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ” //
analyzed: etāvat sakhi vedmi kevalam aham tasya aṅgasaṅge punar kā asau kā asmi ratam nu kim katham iti su alpā api me na smṛtiḥ
atra arthe
dhanyāḥ tu yāḥ kathayatha priya saṅgame viśrabdha cāṭuka śatāni rata antareṣu

original: nīvīṃ prati praṇihite tu kare priyeṇa sakhyaḥ śapāmi yadi kiñcidapi smarāmi” //
analyzed: nīvīm prati praṇihite tu kare priyeṇa sakhyaḥ śapāmi yadi kiñcid api smarāmi
kāraṇa parāvṛttyā hetu vyatyayaḥ
yathā
tatas śaśī
daghre kāma parikṣāma kāminī gaṇḍa pāṇḍu tām
atra arthe
samam kusuma cāpena garbhiṇī gaṇḍa pāṇḍunā
udayādri śiraḥ sīmni nihitam padam indunā
dṛṣṭasya vastunaḥ nyatra saṃkramitiḥ saṅkrāntakam
yathā
snāna ārdraiḥ vidhutaka varī bandha lolaiḥ idānīm śroṇī bhāraḥ kṛta paricayaḥ pallavaiḥ kuntalānām

original: apyetebhyo nabhasi patataḥ paṅkiśo vāribindūn sthitvodgrīvaṃ kuvalayadṛśāṃ kolihaṃsāḥ pibanti” //
analyzed: api etebhyaḥ nabhasi patataḥ paṅkiśas vāri bindūn sthitvā udgrīvam kuvalaya dṛśām koli haṃsāḥ pibanti
atra arthe
sadyas snāta japat tapodhana jaṭā prāntaḥ trutāḥ pronmukhaiḥ pīyante mbu kaṇāḥ kuraṅga śiśubhiḥ tṛṣṇā vyathā viklavaiḥ

original: etāṃ premabharālasāṃ ca sahasā śuṣyanmukhīmākulaḥ śliṣyan rakṣati pakṣasampuṭakṛtacchāyaḥ śakuntaḥ priyām” //
analyzed: etām prema bhara alasām ca sahasā śuṣyat mukhīm ākulaḥ śliṣyan rakṣati pakṣa sampuṭa kṛta chāyaḥ śakuntaḥ priyām
yathā

original: “vindhyasyādreḥ parisaranadī narmadā subhru saiṣā yādobharttuḥ prathamagṛhiṇīṃ yāṃ viduḥ paścimasya /
analyzed: vindhyasya adreḥ parisara nadī narmadā subhru sā eṣā yādaḥ bharttuḥ prathama gṛhiṇīm yām viduḥ paścimasya

original: yasyāmantaḥ sphuritaśapharatrāsahāsākulākṣī svairaṃ svairaṃ kathamapi mayā tīramṛttāritāsi” //
analyzed: yasyām antar sphurita śaphara trāsa hāsa ākula akṣī svairam svairam katham api mayā tīra mṛd tāritā asi
yathā
nābhī guhā bila viśaḥ cala vīci jāta mañju dhvani śruti kaṇat kala kukkubhāni
revā jalāni aviralam grahilīkriyante lāṭa aṅganābhiḥ aparāhna nimajjaneṣu
atra arthe
yat vargyābhiḥ jagāhe guru śakula kula āsphālana trāsa hāsa vyasta ūru stambhikā abhidiṃśi diśi saritām diś jaya prakrameṣu
ambhaḥ gambhīra nābhī kuhara kavalana unmukti paryāya lolat kallola ābaddha mugdha dhvani cakita raṇat kukkubham kāminībhiḥ
saḥ yam kaveḥ akavi tva dāyī sarvathā pratibimba kalpaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ
yatas
pṛthaktvena na gṛhṇānti vastu kāvya antara sthitam
pṛthaktvena na gṛhṇanti sva vapuḥ pratibimbitam

original: iti rājaśekharakṛtau kāvyamīmāṃsāyāṃ kavirahasye prathame 'dhikaṇe śabdārthaharaṇopāyāḥ kaviprabhedāḥ pratibimbakalpavikalpasya samīkṣā dvādaśo  #
analyzed: iti rājaśekhara kṛtau kāvyamīmāṃsāyām kavirahasye prathame dhikaṇe śabda artha haraṇa upāyāḥ kavi prabhedāḥ pratibimba kalpa vikalpasya samīkṣā
dhyāyaḥ
adhyaya
rājacaryā trayodaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ artha haraṇeṣu ālekhya prakhyā ādi bhedāḥ ālekhya prakhya parisaṅkhyāḥ
sadṛśañcāraṇam sama kramaḥ
yathā
asta adri veśmani diśaḥ varuṇapriyāyāḥ tiryak kathañcid apayantraṇam āsthitāyāḥ
gaṇḍa eka pārśvam iva kuṅkuma paṅka cimbu bimbam rucām adhipateḥ aguṇam rarāja
yathā ca
prāc diśaḥ pratikalam vilasantyāḥ kuṅkuma aruṇa kapola talena
sāmyam eti kalita udaya rāgaḥ paśya sundari tuṣāramayūkhaḥ
alaṅkṛtam an alaṅkṛtya abhidhīyate iti vibhūṣaṇa moṣaḥ
yathā

original: “kuvalayasiti mūle bālacandrāṅkurābhaṃ tadanu khalu tato 'gre pākapītāmrapītam /
analyzed: kuvalaya siti mūle bāla candra aṅkura ābham tadanu khalu tatas gre pāka pīta āmra pītam

original: abhinavaravirocirdhūmadhūbhraṃ śikhāyām iti vivadhavikāraṃ didyute daipamarciḥ” //
analyzed: śikhāyām iti vivadha vikāram didyute daipam arciḥ
atra arthe

original: “manāṅmūle nīlaṃ tadanu kapiśonmeṣamudare tataḥ pāṇḍu stokaṃ sphuradaruṇalekhaṃ ca tadanu /
analyzed: manāk mūle nīlam tadanu kapiśa unmeṣam udare tatas pāṇḍu stokam sphurat aruṇa lekham ca tadanu

original: śikhāyāmādhūbhraṃ dhṛtavividhavarṇakramamiti kṣaṇādarcirdaipaṃ dalayati tamaḥ puñjitamapi” //
analyzed: śikhāyām ādhūbhram dhṛta vividha varṇa kramam iti kṣaṇāt arciḥ daipam dalayati tamaḥ puñjitam api
krameṇa abhihitasya arthasya viparīta abhidhānam vyutkramaḥ
yathā tatra eva

original: “śyāmaṃ śikhābhuvi manāgaruṇaṃ tato 'dhaḥ stokāvapāṇḍuradhanaṃ ca tato 'pyadhastāt /
analyzed: śyāmam śikhā bhuvi manāk aruṇam tatas stoka avapāṇḍura dhanam ca adhastāt

original: āpiñjaraṃ tadanu tasya tale ca nīlam andhaṃ tamaḥ paṭalamarddati daipamarciḥ” //
analyzed: āpiñjaram tadanu tasya tale ca nīlam andham tamaḥ paṭalam arddati daipam arciḥ
yathā
iti udgate śaśini peśala kānta dūtī saṃlāpa sañcalita locana mānasābhiḥ
agrāhi maṇḍana vidhiḥ viparīta bhūṣā vinyāsa hāsita sakhī janam aṅganābhiḥ
atra arthe
cakāra kācid sita candana aṅke kāñcī kalāpam stana bhāra dṛṣṭe

original: priyaṃ prati preṣitacittavṛttirnitambabimbe ca babandha hāram” //
analyzed: priyam prati preṣita cittavṛttiḥ nitamba bimbe ca babandha hāram
upasarjanasya arthasya pradhāna tāyām uttaṃsaḥ
yathā
dīpayan atha nabhaḥ kiraṇa odhaiḥ kuṅkuma aruṇa payodhara gauraḥ
hema kumbhaḥ iva pūrva payodheḥ unmamañja śanakais tuhināṃśuḥ
atra arthe
tatas tamaḥ śyāmala paṭṭa kañcukam vipāṭayat kiñcid dadaśyata antarā
niśā taruṇyāḥ sthita śeṣa kuṅkuma stana abhirāmam sakalam kalāvataḥ
tat eva vastu ukti vaśāt anyathā kriyate iti naṭa nepathyam
yathā
ānana indu śaśa lakṣma kapole sa ādaram viracitam tilakam yat
tad priye viracita avadhi bhaṅge dhautam īkṣaṇa jalaiḥ tarala akṣyāḥ
atra arthe
śoka aśrubhiḥ vāsara khaṇḍitānām siktāḥ kapoleṣu vilāsinīnām
kānteṣu kāla atyayam ācaransu su alpa āyuṣaḥ patra latāḥ babhūvuḥ
parikara sāmye sati api parikāryasya anyathātvāt eka parikāryaḥ

original: avyādgajendravadanaḥ sa imāṃ trilokīṃ yasyodgatena gagane mahatā kareṇa /
analyzed: avyāt gaja indra vadanaḥ saḥ imām trilokīm yasya udgatena gagane mahatā kareṇa
mūla āvala grasita danta bisa aṅkureṇa nālāyitam tapana bimba sarohasya
atra arthe
sarala kara daṇḍa nālam gaja vapuṣaḥ puṣkaram vibhoḥ jayati
mūla bisa kāṇḍa bhūmau yatra abhūt eka daṃṣṭrā eva
vikṛteḥ prakṛti prāpaṇam pratyāpattiḥ
yathā
ravi saṅkrānta saubhāgyaḥ tuṣāra āvṛta maṇḍalaḥ
niḥśvāra andhaḥ iva ādarśaḥ candramāḥ na prakāśate
atra arthe
tasyāḥ pratidvandvi bhavāt viṣādāt sadyas vimuktam mukham ābabhāse
niḥśvāsa bāṣpa apagame prasannaḥ prasādam ātmīyam iva ātma darśaḥ
tāḥ imāḥ ālekhyaprakhyasya bhidāḥ
saḥ yam anugrāhyaḥ mārgaḥ
āhuḥ ca
saḥ yam bhaṇiti vaicitryāt samastaḥ vastu vistaraḥ
naṭa vat varṇikā yāgāt anyathā anyathātvam iva ārcchati
atha tulya dehi tulyasya bhidāḥ
tasya eva vastunaḥ viṣaya antara yojanāt anya rupa āpattiḥ viśaya parivarttiḥ
yathā

original: “ye sīmantitagātrabhasmarajaso ye kumbhakadveṣiṇo ye līḍhāḥ śravaṇāśrayeṇa phaṇinā ye candraśaityadruhaḥ /
analyzed: ye sīmantita gātra bhasma rajasaḥ ye kumbhaka dveṣiṇaḥ ye līḍhāḥ śravaṇāśrayeṇa phaṇinā ye candra śaitya druhaḥ
te kupyat girijā vibhakta vapuṣaḥ citta vyathā sākṣiṇaḥ sthāṇoḥ dakṣiṇa nāsikā puṭa bhruvaḥ śvāsa anilāḥ pāntu vaḥ
atra arthe

original: “ye kīrṇākvathitodarābjamadhavo te mlāpitoraḥ strajo ye tāpāttaralena talpaphaṇinā pītapratāpobhphijtāḥ /
analyzed: ye te mlāpita uraḥ te mlāpita uraḥ strajaḥ ye tāpāt taralena talpa phaṇinā

original: te rādhāsmṛtisākṣiṇaḥ kamalayā sāsūyamākarṇitā gāḍhāntardavathoḥ pratatpasaralāḥ śvāsā hareḥ pāntu vaḥ” //
analyzed: te rādhā smṛti sākṣiṇaḥ kamalayā sa asūyam ākarṇitāḥ gāḍha antar davathoḥ śvāsāḥ hareḥ pāntu vaḥ
dvis rupasya vastunaḥ dvandva vicchittiḥ
yathā

original: “utkleśaṃ keśabandhaḥ kusumaśararipoḥ kalmaṣaṃ vaḥ sa muṣyād yatrendanaṃ vīkṣya gaṅgājalabharalulitaṃ bālabhāvādabhūtām /
analyzed: utkleśam keśa bandhaḥ kusuma śara ripoḥ kalmaṣam vaḥ sa muṣyāt yatra indanam vīkṣya gaṅgā jala bhara lulitam bāla bhāvāt abhūtām
krauñcārātiḥ ca phāṇṭa sphurita śapharikā moha lola īkṣaṇa śrīḥ sadyas prodyat mṛṇālī grahaṇa rasa lasat puṣkaraḥ ca dvipa āsyaḥ
atra arthe

original: “diśyāddhūrjaṭijūṭakoṭisariti jyotsnālavodbhāsinī śāśāṅkī kalikā jalabhramivaśād drāga dṛṣṭanaṣṭā sukham /
analyzed: diśyāt dhūrjaṭi jūṭa koṭi sariti jyotsnā lava udbhāsinī śāśāṅkī kalikā jala bhrami vaśāt drāga dṛṣṭa naṣṭā sukham
yām cañcat sapharī bhrameṇa mukulīkurvan phaṇa ālīm muhur muhyat lakṣyam ahiḥ jighṛkṣati tamām ākuñcana prāñcanaiḥ
ratnamālā
yathā

original: “kapole mārjāraḥ paya iti karāṃlleḍhi śaśinas tarucchidraprotānbisamiti kareṇuḥ kalayati /
analyzed: kapole mārjāraḥ payaḥ iti karān leḍhi śaśinaḥ taru chidra protān bisam iti kareṇuḥ kalayati

original: ratānte talpasthānharati vanitāpyaṃśukamiti prabhāmattaścandro jagadidamaho vibhramayati” //
analyzed: rata ante talpa sthān harati vanitā api aṃśukam iti prabhā mattaḥ candraḥ jagat idam aho vibhramayati
atra arthe

original: “jyotsnārcirdugdhabuddhyā kavalitamasakṛdbhājane rājahaṃsaiḥ svāṃse karpūrapāṃsucchuraṇarabhasataḥ sambhṛtaṃ sundarībhiḥ /
analyzed: jyotsnā arciḥ dugdha buddhyā kavalitam asakṛt bhājane rājahaṃsaiḥ sva aṃse karpūra pāṃsu churaṇa rabhasataḥ sambhṛtam sundarībhiḥ

original: pubhbhirvyastaṃ stanāntātsicayamiti rahaḥ sambhrame vallabhānāṃ līḍhaṃ drāksindhuvāreṣvabhinavasumanolampaṭaiḥ ṣaṭpadaiśca” //
analyzed: pubhbhiḥ vyastam stana antāt sicayam iti rahaḥ sambhrame vallabhānām līḍham drāk sindhuvāreṣu abhinava sumanaḥ lampaṭaiḥ ṣaṭpadaiḥ ca
saṅkhyā vaiṣamyeṇa artha praṇayanam saṅkhyā ullekhaḥ
yathā
namat nārāyaṇa chāyā ācchuritāḥ pādayoḥ nakhāḥ
tvad candram iva sevante rudra rudra indavaḥ daśa
atra arthe
umā eka pāda amburuhe sphurat nakhe kṛta āgasaḥ yasya śiraḥ samāgame

original: ṣaḍātmatāmāśrayatīva candramāḥ sa nīlakaṇṭhaḥ priyamātanotu vaḥ” //
analyzed: ṣaṣ ātma tām āśrayati iva candramāḥ sa nīlakaṇṭhaḥ priyam ātanotu vaḥ
samam abhidhāya adhikasya upanyāsaḥ cūlikā

original: dvidhā ca sā saṃvādinī visaṃvādinī ca /
analyzed: dvidhā ca sā saṃvādinī visaṃvādinī ca
tayoḥ prathamā yathā
aṅgaṇe śaśi marīci lepane
rājahaṃsam a samīkṣya kātarā rauti haṃsa vanitā aśru gadga gam
atra arthe
canda prabhā prasara hisini saudha pṛṣṭe durlakṣa pakṣati puṭām na viveda jāyām
mūḍha śrutiḥ mukhara nūpura niḥsvanena vyāhāriṇīm api puras gṛha rājahaṃsaḥ
dvitīyā tatra eva arthe yathā
jyotsnā jala snāyini saudha pṛṣṭe vivikta muktāphala pujja rauram
viveda haṃsī vayitam kathañcid culat tulā koṭi kalaiḥ ninādaiḥ
niṣedhasya vidhinā nibandhaḥ vidhāna apahāraḥ
yathā

original: “kurabaka kucāghātakrīḍārasena viyujyase bakulaviṭapin smarttavyaṃ te mukhāsavasecanam /
analyzed: kurabaka kuca āghāta krīḍā rasena viyujyase bakula viṭapin smarttavyam te mukha āsava secanam

original: caraṇaghaṭanāśūnyo yāsyasyaśoka saśokatām iti nijapuratyāge yasya dviṣāṃ jagaduḥ striyaḥ” //
analyzed: caraṇa ghaṭanā śūnyaḥ yāsyasi aśoka sa śoka tām iti nija pura tyāge yasya dviṣām jagaduḥ striyaḥ
atra arthe
mukha madirayā pāda nyāsaiḥ vilāsa vilokitaiḥ bakula viṭapī rakta aśokaḥ tatā tilaka drumaḥ

original: jalanidhitaṭīkāntārāṇāṃ kramātkakubhāṃ jaye jhagiti gamitā yadvargyābhirvikāsamahotsavam” //
analyzed: jalanidhi taṭīka antārāṇām kramāt kakubhām jaye jha c iti gamitāḥ yad vargyābhiḥ vikāsa mahā utsavam
bahūnām arthānām ekatra upasaṃhāraḥ māṇikyapujjaḥ
yathā
śaila chalena svam dīrgham bhūvadhūḥ
niśā sakhyā karoti iva śaśāṅka tilakam mukhe
yathā ca
phulla atimukta kusuma stavaka abhirāma dūra ullasat kiraṇa kesaram induḥ siṃham
dṛṣṭvā udayādri śikhara sthitam andhakāra durvāra vāraṇa ghaṭāḥ vyaghaṭanta sadyas
yathā ca
saṃvidhātum abhiṣekam udāse manmathasya lasarda śu jala oghaḥ
yāminī vanitayā tata cihnaḥ sa utpalaḥ rajata kumbhaḥ iva induḥ
yathā ca
udayati paśya kṛśa udari dalita tvac
kṣīra karaṇibhiḥ kiraṇaiḥ
udayācala cūḍa maṇiḥ eṣa purā rohiṇīramaṇaḥ
yathā ca
udayati navanīta piṇḍa pāṇḍuḥ kumuda vanāni avaghaṭṭayan kara agraiḥ
udayagiri taṭa sphaṭa aṭṭahāsaḥ rajani vadhī mukha darpaṇaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ
yathā ca
smin sasnau iva tamaḥ mbubhiḥ
nabhaḥ taḍāge madanaḥ tārā kumuda hāsini
atra arthe
rajani purandhri rodhra tilakaḥ timira dvipa yūtha kesarī rajata mayaḥ bhiṣeka kalaśaḥ kusumāyudha medinīpateḥ

original: ayamudayācalaikacūḍāmaṇirabhinavadarpaṇo diśām udayati gaganasarasi haṃsasya hasanniva vibhramaṃ śaśī” //
analyzed: ayam udayācala eka cūḍāmaṇiḥ abhinava darpaṇaḥ diśām udayati gagana sarasi haṃsasya hasan iva vibhramam śaśī
kanda bhūtaḥ ṛthaḥ kandalāyamānaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ abhidhīyate iti kandaḥ
yathā ca
viśikhā mukheṣu visarati puñjībhavati iva saudha śikhareṣu
kumuda ākareṣu vikasati śaśi kalaśa paristrutā jyotsnā
atra arthe

original: “viyati visarpatīva kumudeṣu bahūbhavatīva yoṣitāṃ pratiphalatīva jaraṭhaśarakāṇḍuṣu gaṇḍabhittiṣu /
analyzed: viyati visarpatī iva kumudeṣu yoṣitām pratiphalatī iva jaraṭha śara kāṇḍuṣu gaṇḍa bhittiṣu

original: ambhasi vikasatīva lasatīva sudhādhavaleṣu dhāmasu dhvajapaṭapallaveṣu lalatīva samīracaleṣu candrikā” //
analyzed: ambhasi vikasatī iva lasatī iva sudhā dhavaleṣu dhāmasu dhvaja paṭa pallaveṣu lalatī iva samīra caleṣu candrikā
sphaṭika maṇi ghaṭaḥ iva induḥ tasyām apidhānam ānanam iva aṅkaḥ

original: kṣarati ciraṃ yena yathā jyotsnā ghanasāradhūliriva //
analyzed: kṣarati ciram yena yathā jyotsnā ghanasāra dhūliḥ iva
sita maṇi kalaśa ākad indoḥ hariṇa harit tṛṇa pidhānataḥ galitaiḥ
rajani bhujiṣyā siñcati nabhaḥ ṅgaṇam candrikā ambhobhiḥ
saṃvidhātum abhiṣekam udāse manyathasya lasat aṃśu jala oghaḥ
yāminī vanitayā tata cihnaḥ sa utpalaḥ rajata kumbhaḥ iva induḥ
tāḥ imāḥ tulya dehi tulyasya parisaṃkhyāḥ
saḥ yam ullekhavān anugrāhyaḥ mārgaḥ iti surānandaḥ
tat āha

original: “sarasvatī sā jayati prakāmaṃ devī śrutiḥ svastyayanaṃ kavīnām /
analyzed: sarasvatī sā jayati prakāmam devī śrutiḥ svastyayanam kavīnām
anargha tām ānayati sva bhaṅgyā yā ullikhya yat kiñcat iha artha natnam
atha para pura praveśa sat daśasya bhidāḥ
upanibaddhasya vastunaḥ yuktimatī parivṛttiḥ huṅḍa yuddham
yathā
katham asau na bhajati aśarīra tām hata viveka padaḥ hatam anyathaḥ

original: praharataḥ kadalīdalakomale bhavati yasya dayā na vadhūjane” //
analyzed: praharataḥ kadalī dala komale bhavati yasya dayā na vadhū jane
atra arthe
katham asau madanaḥ na namasyatām sthita viveka padaḥ makaradhvajaḥ
mṛga dṛśām kadalī lalitam vapuḥ yat abhihanti śaraiḥ kusuma udbhavaiḥ

original: prakārāntareṇa visadṛśaṃ yadvastu tasya nibandhaḥ pratikañcukam /
analyzed: prakāra antareṇa visadṛśam yat vastu tasya nibandhaḥ prati kañcukam
yathā
mādyan cakora īkṣaṇa tulya dhāmnaḥ dhārām dadhānāḥ madhunā madhunaḥ patantīm
cañcu agra daṣṭa utpala nāla hṛdyā haṃsī iva reje śaśi ratna pārī
atra arthe
masāra pāreṇa babhau dadānā kācid surām vidruma nālakena
vallūra vallīm dadhatā iva cañcvā kelī śukena añjalinā dhṛtena
upamānasya upamāna antara parivṛttiḥ vastu saṃcāraḥ
yathā

original: “aviralamiva dāmnā pauṇḍarīkeṇa baddhaḥ snapita iva ca dugdhasrotasā nirbhareṇa /
analyzed: aviralam iva dāmnā pauṇḍarīkeṇa baddhaḥ snapitaḥ iva ca dugdha srotasā nirbhareṇa

original: kavalita iva kṛtsnaścakṣuṣā sphāritena prasabhamamṛtamegheneva sāndreṇa siktaḥ” //
analyzed: kavalitaḥ iva kṛtsnaḥ cakṣuṣā sphāritena prasabham amṛta meghena iva sāndreṇa siktaḥ
atra arthe

original: “muktānāmiva rajjavo himarucermālāḥ kalānāmiva kṣīrābdheriva vīcayaḥ klamamuṣaḥ pīyūṣadhārā iva /
analyzed: muktānām iva rajjavaḥ himaruceḥ mālāḥ kalānām iva kṣīrābdheḥ iva vīcayaḥ klama muṣaḥ pīyūṣa dhārāḥ iva

original: dīrghāpāṅganadīṃ vilaṅdhya sahasā līlānubhāvāñcitāḥ sadyaḥ premabharollasā bhṛgadṛśo māmabhyaṣiñcandṛśaḥ” //
analyzed: dīrgha apāṅga nadīm vilaṅdhya sahasā līlā anubhāva āñcitāḥ sadyas prema bhara ullasāḥ bhṛga dṛśaḥ mām abhyaṣiñcan dṛśaḥ
śabda alaṅkārasya artha alaṅkāreṇa anyathātvam dhātuvādaḥ
yathā
jayanti bāṇa asura mauli lālitāḥ daśa āsya cūḍāmaṇi cakra cumbinaḥ
sura asura adhīśa śikhā anta śāyinaḥ bhavat chidaḥ tryambaka pādapa aṃśavaḥ
atra arthe
jayanti apūrva vyāpārāḥ purāreḥ pādapa aṃśavaḥ
tasya eva vastunaḥ utkarṣeṇa anyathā karaṇam satkāraḥ
yathā
snāna ārdra ardaiḥ vidhuta kabarī bandha lolaiḥ idānīm śroṇī bhāraḥ kṛta paricayaḥ pallavaiḥ kuntalānām

original: apyetebhyo nabhasi patataḥ paṅktiśo vāribindūn sthitvodgrīvaṃ kuvalayadṛśāṃ kelihaṃsāḥ pibanti” //
analyzed: api etebhyaḥ nabhasi patataḥ paṅktiśas vāri bindūn sthitvā udgrīvam kuvalaya dṛśām keli haṃsāḥ pibanti
atra arthe

original: “lakṣmyāḥ kṣīranidherudaktavapuṣo veṇīlatāgracyutā ye muktāgrathanāmasūtrasubhagāḥ prātpāḥ payobindavaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣmyāḥ kṣīranidheḥ udakta vapuṣaḥ veṇī latā agra cyutāḥ ye muktā gratha nāma sūtra subhagāḥ prāt pāḥ payaḥ bindavaḥ

original: te vaḥ pāntu viśeṣasaspṛhaddaśā dṛṣṭāściraṃ śārṅgiṇā helodgrīvajaleśahaṃsavanitālīḍhāḥ sudhāsvādavaḥ” //
analyzed: te vaḥ pāntu viśeṣa sa spṛhat daśāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ ciram śārṅgiṇā helā udgrīva jaleśa haṃsa vanitā līḍhāḥ sudhā svādavaḥ
pūrvam sadṛśaḥ paścāt bhinnaḥ jīvañcīvakaḥ
yathā
nayana udarayoḥ kapola bhāge rucimat ratna gaṇeṣu bhūṣaṇeṣu
sakala pratibimbita indu bimbā śata candra ābharaṇā eva kācitā āsīt
atra arthe
bhāsvat kapola tala kuṇḍala pārihārya sat mekhalā maṇi gaṇa pratibimbitena
candreṇa bhāti ramaṇī ramaṇīya vaktra śobhā abhibhūta vapuṣā iva niṣevyamāṇā
yathā
tāmbūla vallī pariṇaddha pūgāsu elā latā āliṅgita candanāsu
tamāla patra āstaraṇāsu rantum prasīda śaścat malaya sthalīṣu
atra arthe
niśvetanānām api yukta yoga daḥ nūnam saḥ enam madanaḥ dhiṣṭhati
elā yadā āśliṣṭavatī iha candanam pūga drumam nāga latā adhirohati
yathā

original: “hāro vakṣasi dantapatraviśadaṃ karṇe dalaṃ kaumudaṃ mālā mūrdhni dukūlinī tanulatā karpūraśuklau stanau /
analyzed: hāraḥ vakṣasi danta patra viśadam karṇe dalam kaumudam mālā mūrdhni dukūlinī tanu latā karpūra śuklau stanau

original: vaktre candanabindurindudhavalaṃ bālaṃ mṛṇālaṃ kare veṣaḥ kiṃ sita eṣa sundari śaraścandrāttvayā śikṣitaḥ” //
analyzed: vaktre candana binduḥ indu dhavalam bālam mṛṇālam kare veṣaḥ kim sitaḥ eṣa sundari śaraḥ candrāt tvayā śikṣitaḥ
atra arthe

original: “mūrtirnīladukūlinī mṛgamadaiḥ pratyaṅgapatrakriyā vāhū mecakaratnakaṅkaṇabhṛtau kaṇṭhe masārāvalī /
analyzed: mūrtiḥ nīla dukūlinī mṛgamadaiḥ pratyaṅga patra kriyā vāhū mecaka ratna kaṅkaṇa bhṛtau kaṇṭhe masāra āvalī

original: vyālambālakavallarīkamalikaṃ kāntābhisārotsave yatsatyaṃ tamasā mṛgākṣi vihitaṃ veṣe tavācāryakam” //
analyzed: vyālamba alaka vallarī kamalikam kāntā abhisāra utsave yat satyam tamasā mṛga akṣi vihitam veṣe tava ācāryakam
iti artha haraṇa upāyāḥ dvārtriṃśat upadarśitāḥ
hāna upādāna vijñāne kavi tvam tatra mām prati
kim ca ete haraṇa upāyāḥ jñeyāḥ sa pratiyoginaḥ
arthasya vaiparītyena vijñeyā pratiyogitā
kiñca

original: śabdārthaśāsanavidaḥ kati no kavante yadvāṅmayaṃ śrutidhanasya cakāsti cakṣuḥ /
analyzed: śabda artha śāsana vidaḥ kati no kavante yat vāc mayam śruti dhanasya cakāsti cakṣuḥ

original: kintvasti yadvacasi vastu navaṃ sadukti-sandarbhiṇāṃ sa dhuri tasya giraḥ pavitrāḥ //
analyzed: kintu asti yat vacasi vastu navam sat ukti sandarbhiṇām sa dhuri tasya giraḥ pavitrāḥ
iti rājaśekhara kṛtau kāvyamīmāṃsāyām kavirahasye prathame dhikaraṇe artha haraṇeṣu ālekhya prakhyā ādi bhedāḥ trayodaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
adhyaya
caturdaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
kavi samayaḥ jāti dravya kriyā samaya sthāpanā

original: aśāstrīyamalaukikaṃ ca paramparāyātaṃ yamarthamupanibadhnanti kavayaḥ sa kavisamayaḥ /
analyzed: aśāstrīyam alaukikam ca paramparā yātam yam artham upanibadhnanti kavayaḥ sa kavi samayaḥ
nanu eṣa doṣaḥ
kathaṅkāram punar upanibandhana arhaḥ
iti ācāryāḥ
kavi mārga anugrāhī katham eṣa doṣaḥ
iti yāyāvarīyaḥ
nimittam tarhi vācyam iti ācāryāḥ
idam abhidhīyate iti yāyāvarīyaḥ

original: pūrve hi vidvāṃsaḥ sahasraśākhaṃ sāṅgaṃ ca vedamavagāhya,
analyzed: pūrve hi vidvāṃsaḥ sahasra śākham sa aṅgam ca vedam avagāhya
śāstrāṇi ca avabudhya
deśa anterāṇi dvīpa antarāṇi ca paribhramya

original: yānarthānupalabhya praṇītavantasteṣāṃ deśakālāntaravaśena anyathātve 'pi tathātvenopanibandho yaḥ sa kavisamayaḥ /
analyzed: yān arthān upalabhya praṇītavantaḥ teṣām deśa kāla antara vaśena anyathātve pi tathātvena upanibandhaḥ yaḥ sa kavi samayaḥ
kavi samaya śabdaḥ ca ayam mūlam a paśyadbhiḥ prayoga mātra daśibhiḥ prayuktaḥ rūḍhaḥ ca
tatra kaścid ādya tvena vyavasthitaḥ kavi samayena arthaḥ
kaścid parasyara upakrama artham sva arthāya dhūrttaiḥ pravarttitaḥ

original: sa ca tridhā svargyo bhaumaḥ pātālīyaśca /
analyzed: sa ca tridhā svargyaḥ bhaumaḥ pātālīyaḥ ca
svargya pātālīyayoḥ bhaumaḥ pradhānaḥ
sa hi mahā viṣayakaḥ
sa ca caturddhā jāti dravya guṇa kriyā rupa artha tayā
te pi pratyakṣam tridhā asataḥ nibandhanāt
sataḥ upi a nibandhanāt
niyamataḥ ca
tatra sāmānyasya asataḥ nibandhanam
yathā nadīṣu padma utpala ādīni
jalāśaya mātre pi haṃsa ādayaḥ
yatra tatra parvateṣu suvarṇa ratna ādikam ca
nadī padmāni yathā
dīrghīkurvan paṭu mada kalam kūjitam sārasānām pratyūṣeṣu sphuṭita kamala āmoda maitrī kaṣāyaḥ

original: yatra strīṇāṃ harati surataglānimaṅgānukūlaḥ śiprāvātaḥ priyatama iva prārthanācāṭukāraḥ” //
analyzed: yatra strīṇām harati surata glānim aṅga anukūlaḥ śiprā vātaḥ priyatamaḥ iva prārthanā cāṭu kāraḥ
gagana gamana līlā ālambhitān sveda bindūn mṛdubhiḥ anila vāraiḥ khecarāṇām harantīm
kuvalaya vana kāntyā jāhvavīm saḥ bhyapaśyat dinapati sutayā iva
evam nadī kumuda ādi api
salila mātre haṃsāḥ yathā

original: “āsīdasti bhaviṣyatīha sa jano dhanyo dhanī dhārmikaḥ yaḥ kṣīkeśavavatkariṣyati punaḥ śrīmatkuḍuṅgeśvaram /
analyzed: āsīt asti bhaviṣyati iha sa janaḥ dhanyaḥ dhanī dhārmikaḥ yaḥ kṣīkeśava vat kariṣyati punar śrīmat kuḍuṅgeśvaram
helā āndolita haṃsa sārasa kula ṛk rekāra saṃmūrccitaiḥ iti āghoṣayati iva tat nava nadī yat ceṣṭitam vāribhiḥ
parvata mātre suvarṇam yathā
sāmyāt sakhyam jagmivān amburāśeḥ eṣa khyātaḥ tena jīmūtabhartā
ratnāni yathā
nīla aśma raśmi paṭalāni mahā ibha mukta sūtkāra sīkara visṛñji taṭa antareṣu
ālokayanti saralīkṛta kaṇṭha nālāḥ sa ānandam ambuda dhiyā atra
evam anyat api
sataḥ pi a nibandhanam
tat yathā ana mānatī vasante
na puṣpa phalam candana drumeṣu
na phalam aśokeṣu
tatra prathamaḥ
mālatī vimukhaḥ caitraḥ vikāsī puṣpa sampadām
āścaryam jāti hīnasya katham su manasaḥ priyāḥ
dvitīyaḥ
yadi api candana viṭapī vidhinā phala kusuma varjitaḥ vihitaḥ
nija vapuṣā eva pareṣām tathā api santāpam apaharati
tṛtīyaḥ

original: “daivāyatte hi phale kiṃ kriyatāmetadatra tu vadāmaḥ /
analyzed: daiva āyatte hi phale kim kriyatām etat atra tu vadāmaḥ
na aśokasya kisalayaiḥ vṛkṣa antara pallavāḥ tulyāḥ
anekatra pravṛtta vṛttīnām ekatra ācaraṇam niyamaḥ
tat yathā samudreṣu eva makarāḥ
tāmraparṇyām eva mauktikāni
tayoḥ prathamaḥ
gotra agrahāram nayataḥ gṛha tvam sva nāma mudrā aṅkitam amburāśim
dāyāda vargeṣu parisphuratsu daṃṣṭra avalepaḥ makarasya vandyaḥ
dvatīyaḥ

original: “kāmaṃ bhavantu sarito bhuvi sapratiṣṭhāḥ svādūni santu salilāni ca śuktayaśca /
analyzed: kāmam bhavantu saritaḥ bhuvi sa pratiṣṭhāḥ svādūni santu salilāni ca śuktayaḥ ca

original: etāṃ vihāya varavarṇini tāmraparṇīṃ nānyatra sambhavati mauktikakāmadhenuḥ” //
analyzed: etām vihāya varavarṇini tāmraparṇīm na anyatra sambhavati mauktika kāmadhenuḥ
asataḥ pi dravyasya nibandhanam
tat yathā muṣṭi grāhya tvam sūcī bhedya tvam ca tamasaḥ
kumbha apavāhya tvam ca jyotsnāyāḥ

anusandhāna śūnyasya bhūṣaṇam dūṣaṇāyate
sa avadhānasya ca kaveḥ dūṣaṇam bhūṣaṇāyate
iti kāla vibhāgasya darśitā vṛttiḥ īdṛśī
kaveḥ iha mahān mohaḥ iha siddhaḥ mahā kaviḥ

original: iti rājaśekharakṛtau kāvyamīmāṃsāyāṃ kavirahasye prathame 'dhikaraṇe kālavibhāgo nāma aṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: iti rājaśekhara kṛtau kāvyamīmāṃsāyām kavirahasye prathame dhikaraṇe kālavibhāgaḥ nāma aṣṭādaśaḥ dhyāyaḥ
samātpam idam prathamam adhikaraṇam kavi rahasyam kāvyamīmāṃsāyām
